Psalm 23
English Standard Version

The Lord Is My Shepherd

A Psalm of David.

23 The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

2 He makes me lie down in green pastures.
He leads me beside still waters.(A)

3 He restores my soul.
He leads me in paths of righteousnessa
for his name’s sake.

4 Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,b
I will fear no evil,
for you are with me;
your rod and your staff,
they comfort me.

5 You prepare a table before me
in the presence of my enemies;
you anoint my head with oil;
my cup overflows.

6 Surelyc goodness and mercyd shall follow me
all the days of my life,
and I shall dwelle in the house of the Lord
forever.f

Footnotes

  1. Psalm 23:3 Or in right paths
  2. Psalm 23:4 Or the valley of deep darkness
  3. Psalm 23:6 Or Only
  4. Psalm 23:6 Or steadfast love
  5. Psalm 23:6 Or shall return to dwell
  6. Psalm 23:6 Hebrew for length of days
